meanings.definition: The quality or state of being high.
meanings.sent1: The highths of the mountain were breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The highths of the tree made it visible from far away.
meanings.sent3: The highths of the building made it look like a giant tower.
meanings.sent4: Her aspirations reached new highths after the success of her project.
meanings.sent5: The highths of the roller coaster made it thrilling to ride.

meanings.definition: A point or position that is higher than others.
meanings.sent1: The highths of the hill provided a great view.
meanings.sent2: The highths of the leaderboard showed the top performers.
meanings.sent3: The highths of the mountain were challenging to reach.
meanings.sent4: His ambition drove him to reach new highths in his career.
meanings.sent5: The highths of the skyscraper were impressive against the skyline.

meanings.definition: The measurement of something from top to bottom.
meanings.sent1: The highths of the door were perfect for the new carpet.
meanings.sent2: The highths of the bookshelf allowed for taller books to fit.
meanings.sent3: The highths of the cake layers made it a towering dessert.
meanings.sent4: She carefully measured the highths of the curtains for the window.
meanings.sent5: The highths of the waterfall were mesmerizing as they cascaded down.
